akn:content.akn:p: A person shall be imprisoned for any term of years or for life, and in addition, may be fined not more than the amount set forth in ยง 22-3571.01, if that person engages in or causes another person to engage in or submit to a sexual act in the following manner:

The court may impose a prison sentence in excess of 30 years only in accordance with ยง 22-3020 or ยง 24-403.01(b-2). For purposes of imprisonment following revocation of release authorized by ยง 24-403.01(b)(7), the offense defined by this section is a Class A felony.
